title: Team Kill Leader
desc: Be the player with the most kills on your team at the end of the match.

title: Revive Master
desc: Revive the most teammates in a single match.

title: Shared Victory
desc: Complete the match without any of your teammates getting eliminated.

title: Medic
desc: Heal a teammate to full health using medical supplies.

title: Gulag Savior
desc: Save a teammate from the Gulag by winning a 1v1 match for them.

title: Ammo Support
desc: Provide the most ammo to your teammates during a match.

title: Vehicle Squad
desc: Successfully escape with your entire squad in a vehicle.

title: Multi-Kill Support
desc: Assist in 5 or more kills with your teammates in a single match.

title: No One Left Behind
desc: Finish the match with your entire squad alive and in the top 10.

title: Enemy Distraction
desc: Distract an enemy long enough for your team to eliminate them.

title: Stealth Squad
desc: Complete a match without alerting the enemy or causing a firefight.

title: Loadout Master
desc: Help your team gather the best loadouts during the match.

title: Squad Tactician
desc: Coordinate a successful strategy with your squad that leads to victory.

title: Split Focus
desc: Successfully flank enemies while your squad is holding the frontline.

title: Safe Zone Coordination
desc: Keep your squad in the safest part of the map at all times during the match.

title: Communicator
desc: Successfully communicate the most important events to your team (e.g., enemy locations, plans, etc.).

title: Elite Teamwork
desc: Finish the match with a 100% team survival rate and at least one teammate with the most kills.

title: Squad Scavenger
desc: Be the player who collects the most loot and distributes it to your squad.

title: Decoy Specialist
desc: Place decoys to confuse the enemy, allowing your team to make a strategic attack.

title: Strategic Revival
desc: Revive a teammate in a dangerous area and help them survive the following battle.

title: In Sync
desc: Successfully synchronize your attack with your team to eliminate all enemies in a given area.
